document.full_text: the rays were again held to one run in a 5-1 defeat to the angels, while the rangers beat felix hernandez and the mariners, 7-3.
document.title: baseball roundup: angels' haren sends tampa bay to 0-5; texas moves to 6-0
lines_and_colors: the rays were again held to one run in a 5-1 defeat to the angels, while the rangers beat felix hernandez and the mariners, 7-3.
